des: Now, you can use Alexa to control all your Smart Envi heating devices. The Alexa app will show you the current settings of the device while also allowing you to turn your heater on or off, adjust the temperature, and set it to a specific temperature, all with your voice or the Alexa app. This skill supports all Smart Envi models which must be connected to the Smart Envi app to use these Alexa skills. The Smart Envi app can be downloaded from the Google Play Store for Android devices or the App Store for iOS devices.
